title: Ontology-Based Social Learning Scenario Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening Offline Activities to Apply Theory-Based Learning Design in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technical Environments

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately apply five core theories related to social phenomena (e.g., conflict theory, functionalism) to given contexts
Learners can structure social problem-solving scenarios in three stages (problem definition-theory linkage-solution derivation) using ontology-based design tools
Learners can evaluate the validity of learning scenarios they wrote based on peer feedback with over 80% participation rate

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
